titleStmt.title: The royal progress; or, A diary of the King's journey from His Majesty's setting out from Kensington, till His return. By a person of quality.
titleStmt.author: Person of quality.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed, and sold by J. Whitlock, near Stationers-Hall,

notesStmt.note: Caption and running title on pg. 3: The royal progress, &c.
Copy includes blank leaf inserted between pgs. 14 and 15.
Reproduction of the original at the British Library.
